评论详情: I love this dress. It is perfect! So happy with the  texture of the fabric!
Picture shows an almost denim-blue color but dress is much darker, more like navy blue.
Really cute dress for a teenager for a dance party. Good quality, true to size.
I got this for my teen for a school dance and it was adorable! It fits so well and was soft, stretchy, comfortable and stylish. She absolutely loved it and got so many compliments.
This dress is cute and fit me just right. I now own it in black and green! I receive many compliments when I wear them, and I feel slightly less poopy. 😆 True story.

评论概述: Perfect dress for anyone dressing up like Midnights for the Taylor Swift Eras tour!
评论详情: I tried on a million dresses to wear to the Taylor Swift Eras tour and decided on this one to represent Midnights. It was so soft and comfortable and the stars were cute without being cheesy. It runs true to size. I am a size 8/10 and bought both a medium and large to try in and kept the large. It was a touch shorter than I wanted it to be but I wore bike shorts underneath to make sure I could dance comfortably!
It feels very nice and looks so good! I used it for my New Years Eve dress and loved it!
I was pleasantly surprised at how shiny the stars are. The fit is perfect.
The starts look like a gradeschooler painted them on. The stars are scratchy against the soft materials. The stars look like they will come off and chip away if you wash this too many times.

This dress is like forever 21 quality. Fits true to size. I got this to wear to the Eras tour and it did it’s job. Probably will also wear for Christmas parties. The only down side is that the dye in the dress rubs off easily to light coloured things (like a purse).
